"Grenade Launcher Boot Camp IV":
"Joseph, retired ARKS training officer, at your service.
Good to see you again. It seems you've become
quite comfortable with a grenade launcher through
the training missions thus far. Now I'd like you to
show me that you can reach even greater heights by
completing this mission. Let's see what you're truly
made of.

*Complete the mission within 15 minutes
on Hard difficulty or above, using only a gripper."

"来たようだな。退役教導官のジョーゼフだ。
ここまでの講習を通じて、君は相当
ランチャーの扱いには慣れたと思う。
さらなる高みを目指すため
こちらの指定した条件をクリアして欲しい！
この任務が達成できたその時こそ
君の実力は世に知らしめられるのだ！

※『グリッパー』以外の大砲不可
ハード以上、15分以内クリア"
